Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{3: 'Judging by photograph, it appears Luna did take something from the Arctic route Union after all.'}
{3: 'But it is hard to tell what it is from this angle.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Could it be...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But if it really was what he thought it was, why would there be such a thing in the ARU?'}
{3: 'What are they planning on using it for? And what does Luna intend on doing with it?'}
{3: 'An ominous thought came to his mind, causing Asimov to subconsciously look at the time.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It seems unlikely, but it'd best to confirm it, then tell the President. Ugh, forget it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He presses the name of another person in his comm log currently overwhelmed with work.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The President gave me quite the headache of an assignment. Now he's gone off to sleep. Think you can get me in touch with survivors from the ARU?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I estimate that the Forest Guard and Forsaken are still there. I need to confirm some information with them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Wait... Survivors?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Celica was stunned for a moment, before coming to her senses.'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Understood... Wait a moment.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'After disconnecting the comm link, Asimov waited for five minutes in a state of perplexity over his work.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Apologies, sir. I tried contacting numerous people, but I couldn't get through to anyone.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Looks like the radio signal transmitter has also been destroyed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Where should we go from here?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Let Hassen get some rest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Any teams that have been to the ARU available for dispatch?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Unfortunately, there have been too many missions as of late.', 4: '2'}
{3: "The sound of Celica's rapidly parsing the attendance record is picked up through the comm link."}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'According to the current mission schedule, the Gray Ravens are the squad that can return to Babylonia the fastest.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Who's the unlucky one...?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'If the mission is urgent, I can ask the Gray Ravens to abandon their current mission and return pronto.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I still have to confirm something first.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Have the Gray Ravens wait for me in the conference room once they return.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '2'}
